virtual void SoftkeyBarView::DrawSoftkeyBar (  const SoftkeyBar &  softkey_bar,
DeviceContext *  dc,
const Rect &  repaint_rect
)  const [protected, pure virtual]
 

Draws the Softkey-Bar. Must be implemented in the corresponding theme view.

Parameters:
softkey_bar Softkey-Bar which should be drawn.
dc Pointer to the device context, where the drawing should be done.
repaint_rect Rectangle which indicates, where the repainting must be done.

Implemented in BlueSkySoftkeyBarView, DefaultSoftkeyBarView, FoggySoftkeyBarView, TestSoftkeyBarView, DefaultSoftkeyBarView, and FoggySoftkeyBarView.
